Uses of Class
model.DataAccessException

  • Packages that use DataAccessException 
    Package Description
    model  

    • Uses of DataAccessException in model

      Methods in model that throw DataAccessException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BookingInfo DataAccess.book(java.lang.String customer, int childCount, int adultCount, boolean groupedSeats)
      Books the specified number of seats for the specified customer.
      BookingInfo DataAccess.cancel(java.lang.String customer, int childCount, int adultCount)
      Cancel, in whole or part, a previous booking made by the specified customer.
      void DataAccess.close()
      Closes the underlying connection and releases all related ressources.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> DataAccess.getAvailableSeats()
      Returns the number of all the available (free) seats.
      BookingInfo DataAccess.getBookingInfo(java.lang.String customer)
      Returns the current booking information for the specified customer.
      Constructors in model that throw DataAccessException 
      Constructor and Description
      DataAccess(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a new DataAccess object that interacts with the specified database, using the specified login and password.
